# NSBezierPath.LineCapStyle.butt

**Case**

Specifies a butt line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.

## Declaration

```swift
case butt
```

## Discussion

Here is an example of the appearance of this style:



## Constants

- **NSBezierPath.LineCapStyle.round**: Specifies a round line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.
- **NSBezierPath.LineCapStyle.square**: Specifies a square line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.
